# AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate

**Protocol**

Methods for receiving audio sample data from an audio capture.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

This protocol defines an interface for delegates of an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureAudioDataOutput] object to receive captured audio sample buffers.

The delegate of an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureAudioDataOutput] object must adopt this protocol. The method in this protocol is optional.

## Managing sample buffer behavior

- **captureOutput(_:didOutput:from:)**: Notifies the delegate that a sample buffer was written.

## Receiving captured audio data

- **setSampleBufferDelegate(_:queue:)**: Sets the delegate that will accept captured buffers and the dispatch queue on which the delegate will be called.
- **sampleBufferDelegate**: The capture object’s delegate.
- **sampleBufferCallbackQueue**: The queue on which delegate callbacks are invoked

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
